long_description: The Gerber E-Tool Folding Spade lets you dig, scoop or saw through groundcover or dirt during your outdoor adventures. Forged steel blade is lightweight and strong to handle the rigors of backcountry camping; serrated edge helps cut through grass and other vegetation. Glass-filled nylon handle and aluminum shaft also deliver tough, lightweight performance. Twist-lock mechanism keeps the spade open when in use. Gerber E-Tool Folding Spade measures 23.75 in. when extended and only 9.25 in. when folded for transport.
short_description: The Gerber E-Tool Folding Spade lets you dig, scoop or saw through groundcover or dirt during your outdoor adventures.
